sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { User, MapPin, Phone, Package, DollarSign, Home } from "lucide-react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" // <-- Import useNavigate for routing const StationaryAdminDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() // <-- Setup navigation hook const [orders, setOrders] = useState([ { id: "DSCE001240", customerName: "Arjun Mehta", customerType: "Student", studentId: "1DS21CS090", phone: "+91 9876543216", email: "arjun.mehta@dsce.edu.in", location: "Computer Science Block - Room 302", items: [ { id: 1, name: "University Record Book", description: "Official university record book with 200 pages, ruled format", quantity: 2, price: 45, category: "Books & Notebooks", }, { id: 7, name: "Blue Ballpoint Pen (Pack of 10)", description: "Smooth writing blue ballpoint pens, reliable ink flow", quantity: 1, price: 50, category: "Writing Instruments", }, { id: 10, name: "Highlighter Set", description: "Fluorescent highlighters, 6 colors, perfect for studying", quantity: 1, price: 60, category: "Writing Instruments", }, ], subtotal: 200, tax: 10, total: 210, orderTime: "2025-01-31 11:45 AM", status: "placed", paymentMethod: "UPI", }, // ... your other orders here (the orders array unchanged) { id: "DSCE001247", customerName: "Dr. Meera Nair", customerType: "Teacher", studentId: "FACULTY_EC_012", phone: "+91 9876543223", email: "meera.nair@dsce.edu.in", location: "Electronics Department - Faculty Room", items: [ { id: 14, name: "Watercolor Paint Set", description: "Student watercolor set, 12 colors with brushes included", quantity: 1, price: 150, category: "Art Supplies", }, { id: 16, name: "Eraser & Sharpener Kit", description: "Premium erasers and sharpeners, various sizes included", quantity: 2, price: 45, category: "Art Supplies", }, { id: 20, name: "Transparent Tape Roll", description: "Clear adhesive tape, 2 rolls, strong adhesion", quantity: 3, price: 25, category: "Office Supplies", }, { id: 26, name: "Phone Stand Holder", description: "Adjustable phone stand for desk, compatible with all phones", quantity: 1, price: 150, category: "Electronics & Accessories", }, ], subtotal: 415, tax: 21, total: 436, orderTime: "2025-01-31 10:45 AM", status: "placed", paymentMethod: "Card", }, ]) const markAsDelivered = (orderId) => { setOrders((prevOrders) => prevOrders.map((order) => (order.id === orderId ? { ...order, status: "delivered" } : order)), ) } const markAsPlaced = (orderId) => { setOrders((prevOrders) => prevOrders.map((order) => (order.id === orderId ? { ...order, status: "placed" } : order)), ) } const placedOrders = orders.filter((order) => order.status === "placed") const deliveredOrders = orders.filter((order) => order.status === "delivered") const OrderCard = ({ order, showDeliverButton = false, showRevertButton = false }) => (

Order #{order.id}

{order.orderTime}

{order.customerType}
{/* Customer Info */}

Customer Details

{order.customerName}
ID: {order.studentId}
{order.phone}
{order.location}
{/* Order Items */}

Order Items ({order.items.length})

{order.items.map((item, index) => (
{item.quantity}x {item.name} ₹{item.price * item.quantity}/-
{item.description}
{item.category}
))}
{/* Bill Summary */}
Subtotal: ₹{order.subtotal}/-
GST (5%): ₹{order.tax}/-
Total: ₹{order.total}/-
Payment: {order.paymentMethod}
{/* Action Buttons */}
{showDeliverButton && ( )} {showRevertButton && ( )}
) const totalRevenue = orders .filter((order) => order.status === "delivered") .reduce((sum, order) => sum + order.total, 0) const styles = { container: { minHeight: "100vh", background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #0f172a, #1e293b)", fontFamily: "system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif", color: "white", }, header: { background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6, #10b981)", padding: "1rem", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "space-between", boxShadow: "0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)", position: "sticky", top: 0, zIndex: 50, }, headerTitle: { fontSize: "1.5rem", fontWeight: "bold", color: "white", margin: 0, }, homeButton: { background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)", border: "none", borderRadius: "50%", width: "40px", height: "40px", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", cursor: "pointer", color: "white", fontSize: "1.25rem", transition: "all 0.3s ease", }, statsContainer: { maxWidth: "1200px", margin: "2rem auto", padding: "0 2rem", display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr))", gap: "1.5rem", }, statCard: { background: "rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8)", backdropFilter: "blur(12px)", borderRadius: "1rem", padding: "1.5rem", border: "1px solid #475569", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "1rem", }, statIcon: { width: "50px", height: "50px", borderRadius: "50%", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", fontSize: "1.5rem", }, statContent: { flex: 1, }, statLabel: { color: "#cbd5e1", fontSize: "0.9rem", margin: "0 0 0.25rem 0", }, statValue: { color: "white", fontSize: "1.5rem", fontWeight: "bold", margin: 0, }, mainContent: { maxWidth: "1200px", margin: "0 auto", padding: "0 2rem", display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1fr 1fr", gap: "2rem", }, sectionContainer: { background: "rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8)", backdropFilter: "blur(12px)", borderRadius: "1rem", border: "1px solid #475569", padding: "2rem", height: "fit-content", }, sectionTitle: { color: "#60a5fa", fontSize: "1.5rem", fontWeight: "bold", marginBottom: "1.5rem", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "0.5rem", }, emptyState: { textAlign: "center", padding: "3rem", color: "#94a3b8", }, emptyIcon: { fontSize: "4rem", marginBottom: "1rem", }, emptyText: { fontSize: "1.25rem", marginBottom: "0.5rem", }, "@media (max-width: 768px)": { mainContent: { gridTemplateColumns: "1fr", gap: "1rem", padding: "0 1rem", }, }, } return (
{/* Header */}
{/* Home button now navigates to '/' */}

DSCE Stationary Store - Admin Dashboard

{"Today's Revenue"}
₹{totalRevenue}/-
{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Orders

{orders.length}

Revenue Today

₹{totalRevenue}/-

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Orders Received Section */}

📋 Orders Received ({placedOrders.length})

{placedOrders.length === 0 ? (
📦
No Pending Orders

New stationary orders will appear here when placed

) : ( placedOrders.map((order) => ) )}
{/* Orders Delivered Section */}

✅ Orders Delivered ({deliveredOrders.length})

{deliveredOrders.length === 0 ? (
✅
No Delivered Orders

Completed stationary orders will appear here

) : ( deliveredOrders.map((order) => ) )}
) } export default StationaryAdminDashboard
